700028f-a.text:
(1)
East 132nd Street (directly in front of power plant), north side, from Locust Ave., to the East River (right), showing the power plant of the United Electric Light and Power Co. The New York, New Haven and Hartford Railroad tracks appear on the left.
April 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a slightly different angle.
April 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
